metadata.title: RHSA-2023:6371: cloud-init security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The cloud-init packages provide a set of init scripts for cloud instances. Cloud instances need special scripts to run during initialization to retrieve and install SSH keys, and to let the user run various scripts.

Security Fix(es):

* cloud-init: sensitive data could be exposed in logs (CVE-2023-1786)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.3 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: cloud-init: sensitive data could be exposed in logs

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
cloud-init is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
